headline: L3Harris Technologies, Inc. (LHX) Receives Multi-Year, $292M Javelin Solid Rocket Motor Contract
summary: L3Harris Technologies, Inc. (NYSE:LHX) is among the 12 Best Defense Stocks to Buy Right Now. On September 15, the company announced that it had won a multi-year, $292 million contract for continued production of propulsion for the Javelin weapon system. This is the largest propulsion production contract received so far for the program and represents a […]
